com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.filesystem
Class BaseTraversePathIter

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.filesystem.BaseTraversePathIter
Direct Known Subclasses:
TraversePathIterable, TraversePathIterator
@FullyTested
public class BaseTraversePathIter
extends Object

Based class for TraversePathIterable and TraversePathIterator to provide read-only access to its attributes.

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)

Method Detail

getRootDirPath

public final File getRootDirPath()
Returns:
root directory to traverse. There is no guarantee this directory exists, but this value is never null.
See Also:
TraversePathIterable.withRootDirPath(File)

getDepthPolicy

public final TraversePathDepthPolicy getDepthPolicy()
Returns:
when to descend directories: first or last. Never null.
See Also:
TraversePathIterable.withDepthPolicy(TraversePathDepthPolicy)

getExceptionPolicy

public TraversePathExceptionPolicy getExceptionPolicy()
Returns:
how to handle exceptions thrown during directory listings
See Also:

getOptionalDescendDirPathFilter

public final PathFilter getOptionalDescendDirPathFilter()
Returns:
filter used before traversing directories. May be null.
See Also:

getOptionalDescendDirPathComparator

public final Comparator<File> getOptionalDescendDirPathComparator()

comparator to sort directories before traversal. May be null.
See Also:

filter used before iterating paths. May be null.
